name: agonistic
content:
agonistic adjective
(FIGHTING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology, psychology
  specialized relating to fighting or aggression (= spoken or physical behaviour that is threatening or involves harm to someone or something): He published a study of agonistic behaviour in freshwater crayfish.

agonistic adjective
(MUSCLES)
anatomy
  specialized relating to an agonist (= a muscle that is pulled in the opposite direction by another muscle): agonistic muscles
